QuestData.Title: Rending Daggers
QuestData.Description: Forget about them, and forget their BREW. We've got real work to do.$b$bThe scroll mentions "rending daggers of the great ones". I've got a feeling I know where to find them.$b$bA pair of mantid lieutenants patrol the Horrid March, to the south. Each one carries a ceremonial dagger.$b$bBring those daggers back here, $n. We may be on the brink of something big.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Blade of Kz'Kzik and the Blade of Ilikkax.
QuestData.CompletionText: I think I'm starting to understand the next few lines of this prophecy, $n.$b$bDo you have the daggers yet?
QuestData.RewardText: These daggers, look!$b$b<Lya holds the blades hilt-to-hilt.>$b$bThey were built to fit together! But how to join them...?
